label: $DEVICE
documentation:
Contains user-specified device status information.
```objectscript
$DEVICE
$D  
```

label: $ECODE
documentation:
Contains the current error code string.
```objectscript
$ECODE
$EC
```

label: $ESTACK
documentation:
Contains the number of context frames saved on the call stack from a user-defined point.
```objectscript
$ESTACK
$ES
```

label: $HALT
documentation:
Contains a halt trap routine call.
```objectscript
$HALT
```

label: $HOROLOG
documentation:
Contains the local date and time for the current process.
```objectscript
$HOROLOG
$H
```

label: $IO
documentation:
Contains the ID of the current input/output device.
```objectscript
$IO
$I
```

label: $JOB
documentation:
Contains the ID of the current process.
```objectscript
$JOB
$J
```

label: $KEY
documentation:
Contains the terminator character from the most recent READ.
```objectscript
$KEY
$K
```

label: $NAMESPACE
documentation:
Contains the namespace for the current stack level.
```objectscript
$NAMESPACE
SET $NAMESPACE=namespace
```

label: $PRINCIPAL
documentation:
Contains the ID of the principal I/O device.
```objectscript
$PRINCIPAL
$P
```

label: $QUIT
documentation:
Contains a flag indicating
what kind of QUIT is required to exit the current context.
```objectscript
$QUIT
$Q
```

label: $ROLES
documentation:
Contains the roles assigned to the current process.
```objectscript
$ROLES
```

label: $STACK
documentation:
Contains the number of context frames saved on the call stack.
```objectscript
$STACK
$ST
```

label: $STORAGE
documentation:
Contains the number of bytes available for local variable storage.
```objectscript
$STORAGE
$S
```

label: $SYSTEM
documentation:
Contains system information about system objects.
```objectscript
$SYSTEM 
$SY  
$SYSTEM.class.method()
```

label: $TEST
documentation:
Contains the truth value resulting from the last command using the timeout option.
```objectscript
$TEST
$T
```

label: $THIS
documentation:
Contains the current class context.
```objectscript
$THIS
```

label: $THROWOBJ
documentation:
Contains the OREF from an unsuccessful THROW.
```objectscript
$THROWOBJ
```

label: $TLEVEL
documentation:
Contains the current nesting level for transaction processing.
```objectscript
$TLEVEL
$TL
```

label: $USERNAME
documentation:
Contains the username for the current process.
```objectscript
$USERNAME
```

label: $X
documentation:
Contains the current horizontal position of the cursor.
```objectscript
$X
```

label: $Y
documentation:
Contains the current vertical position of the cursor.
```objectscript
$Y
```

label: $ZA
documentation:
Contains the status of the last READ on the current device.
```objectscript
$ZA
```

label: $ZB
documentation:
Contains status information for the current I/O device.
```objectscript
$ZB
```

label: $ZCHILD
documentation:
Contains the ID of the last child process.
```objectscript
$ZCHILD
$ZC 
```

label: $ZEOF
documentation:
Contains flag indicating whether end-of-file has been reached.
```objectscript
$ZEOF
```

label: $ZEOS
documentation:
Contains end-of-stream status when reading a compressed stream.
```objectscript
$ZEOS
```

label: $ZERROR
documentation:
Contains the name and location of the last error.
```objectscript
$ZERROR 
$ZE 
```

label: $ZHOROLOG
documentation:
Contains the number of seconds elapsed since InterSystems IRIS startup.
```objectscript
$ZHOROLOG
$ZH
```

label: $ZIO
documentation:
Contains information about the current terminal I/O device.
```objectscript
$ZIO
$ZI
```

label: $ZJOB
documentation:
Contains job status information.
```objectscript
$ZJOB
$ZJ
```

label: $ZMODE
documentation:
Contains current I/O device OPEN parameters.
```objectscript
$ZMODE
$ZM
```

label: $ZNAME
documentation:
Contains the current routine name.
```objectscript
$ZNAME
$ZN
```

label: $ZNSPACE
documentation:
Contains the current namespace name.
```objectscript
$ZNSPACE
```

label: $ZORDER
documentation:
Contains the value of the next global node.
```objectscript
$ZORDER
$ZO
```

label: $ZPARENT
documentation:
Contains the ID of the
parent process of the current process.
```objectscript
$ZPARENT
$ZP
```

label: $ZPI
documentation:
Contains the value of pi.
```objectscript
$ZPI  
```

label: $ZPOS
documentation:
Contains the current file position during the reading of a sequential file.
```objectscript
$ZPOS
```

label: $ZREFERENCE
documentation:
Contains the current global reference.
```objectscript
$ZREFERENCE
$ZR
```

label: $ZSTORAGE
documentation:
Contains the maximum available memory for a process.
```objectscript
$ZSTORAGE
$ZS
```

label: $ZTIMESTAMP
documentation:
Contains the current date and time in Coordinated Universal Time format.
```objectscript
$ZTIMESTAMP
$ZTS
```

label: $ZTIMEZONE
documentation:
Contains the time zone offset from the Greenwich meridian.
```objectscript
$ZTIMEZONE
$ZTZ
```

label: $ZTRAP
documentation:
Contains the location of the current error trap handler.
```objectscript
$ZTRAP 
$ZT
```

label: $ZVERSION
documentation:
Contains a string describing the current version of InterSystems IRIS.
```objectscript
$ZVERSION 
$ZV
```
